System review will be completed within 30 min. Fund will arrive to your account after confirmation by network. Please note that withdrawal is unavailable within 24 hours after resetting the security setting.
Please open your trading password first！
Whether to save a list of choices？

1. Download Google Authenticator APP. iOS users can log into App Store and search “Authenticator” to download.Android users can log into Google Play or search “Google Authenticator” in your mobile browser to download. \n2. Add and back up key in your GA. Open GA and scan the QR code below or enter the key to add a token.this key is used to retrieve your GA when you change or lose your phone. please save and back up the key before binding GA. \n3. Enter your TACU account and click ""complete""
Reliable trading platform for worldwide users
Download and install the Google Authenticator APP

Please upload the photo of the front of the ID card !

Please upload a photo of the front of the Certificate + personal signature on A4 paper with the ID card. The format of the signature is “Name+TACU+UID+current date” (e.g.: Wang Xing TACU 38986 August 8, 2018)
please ensure the photo and personal signature information is clearly visible; the photo content is true and effective, and no modifications can be made. (JPG/PNG/JPEG image format)
Your verification information has been submitted and under review. Return to the Personal Center page in

We apologize for any inconvenience caused.Recharge using %6$s address requires %7$s network confirmations to arrive.Transfer and deposit with smart contract and block reward（Coinbase）are not available and the assets won’t arrive to your account. Application for withdrawal of currency to address
Currently %1$s has no related trading pairs
Please select USDT based on ERC20 to recharge
Please done the payment by %1$s(UTC+8) or you will be regarded as give the qualification up.

1.For each Auction the place - bid times limit will be set. For each Auction service fee starting price will be set. The service fee will increase by certain amount based on the fee of the former bid. There will be 10s countdown right after each bid being placed, the Auction will end when the countdown turns 0 or when the place-bid times limit will be reached. The participants will get the qualification for buying certain amount of auctioned token with certain price, while each placed bid will represent one share of reward after the Auction. Besides, all the participants can get bonus with different proportion for free. 
2. The countdown will start immediately once the participant places a bid, and the timer of the chosen auction will be automatically reset. If the timer returns to zero, it means the participant win the bid. 
3. Winners should buy the token with the hammer price within 24 hours or will be regarded as giving the qualification up. 
4. TACU will cancel the auction and return related assets if any uncontrollable situations such as hacker attack, natural disaster and cheating. 
5. At least one bidder in each auction or the auction will be canceled. 
6. All rights are reserved by TACU.
Fill in the info to make transaction

Notes 
1. Once the seller places an order, his coins will be locked for custody; 
2. The buyer needs to complete the payment within the payment validity period and confirm the payment before the seller release the coins. 
3. The buyer should save the screenshot of the payment voucher. In case of dispute, the payment can be proved by the voucher. 
4. The seller should use the buyer's remarks to determine whether the payment has been completed to release the coins from custody. 
5. After the buyer receives the coins, if no arbitration occurs, the order will be successfully completed. 
6. If there is a discord during the transaction, buyers and sellers can submit arbitration at any time to defend their rights. For details, please refer to the OTC Rules.
I have read it carefully, agree and abide by the platform\'s security tips on OTC transactions and
《TACU digital assets trading platform OTC Specifications and Disclaimer》
You have not set a trading password
Binding failed. Please enter valid information and try again.
You have not applied fas merchant yet

Upload video holding your ID and handwritten paper with UID, name, mobile phone number, date and TACU, read outloud "I (name), ID number (ID number), my source of funds is legal and reliable,I am willing to trade digital assets such as Bitcoin. I fully understand digital currencies and potential risks. I have the ability to resist risks and are willing to bear all risks."
※ Ordinary merchant can be verified for 30 days only.If you need to continue to use the merchant account after 30 days, please reapply.
Merchant account must have 50,000ACU warranty deposit

Ordinary merchant: 
 • Can sell ACU for %1$s/ACU. 
 • Can buy ACU at %2$s/ACU. 
 • The amount of each order is within %3$s ACU. 
 • Verification time %4$s days. 
 
Certified Merchant: 
 • Enjoy ordinary merchant rights. 
 • Can buy ACU at %5$s/ACU. 
 • The amount of each transaction is within %6$s ACU. 
 • Permanent verification. 
 
User& VIP: 
 • Orders can only be placed for existing ads, can not publish ads. 
 • Can purchase ACU at %7$s/ACU. 
 • The amount of each transaction is within %8$s ACU.

▪ New product internal testing. 
▪ Exclusive customer service. 
▪OTC merchant status. 
 ▪ New currencies.

▪ Free participate in offline activities. 
▪ Enjoy standard membership fee. 
▪ Participate in the quality project airDrop. 
▪ High promotion commission.
You have not passed KYC verification

Choosing automatic membership renewal, please note: 
1. Any user can manually cancel the automatic renewal of the membership for the next year. After cancellation, the user will not be charged for the upcoming period and the membership will be terminated. 
2. When the user's account balance is insufficient to deduct the membership fee, an email and SMS reminder will be sent to the user 3 days before the expiration date. If the account's remaining balance is still insufficient to be deducted when it expires, the automatic renewal will be cancelled. 
3. The account balance does not include the balance frozen due to other operations.
Congratulations, you have become the platform %1$s and enjoy exclusive membership rights!
The platform will automatically deduct the corresponding fee from your account upon expiration
* In order to ensure that your renewal is successful, please keep your account balance sufficient for renewal fee deduction
Sorry, but your verification is not completed. Please complete verification before operating.
Sorry, your real-name verification failed. Please contact customer service.
The margin amount will be charged from the coin account
The margin amount will be charged from the OTC account

Please enter the amount of margin withdrawal
Please select the margin deposit amount
The merchant is offline, please return to the OTC Order Center to re-select another merchant to serve you, thank you for your understanding!
The merchant is taking orders, please return to the OTC Order Center to reselect other merchants to serve you, thank you for your understanding!
Please enter the OTC phone number
Before the start of OTC trading, you need to read and agree to the "OTC Trading Specifications and Disclaimer"
4. Users should abide by the principle of anti-money laundering

(1) The user shall strictly follow the platform\'s management requirements for user identity and real-name authentication of the account to ensure that the relevant accounts displayed on the platform are legally registered and used by themselves; \n (2) When triggering the anti-money laundering risk control early warning of the platform, the user should actively cooperate with the platform\'s further anti-money laundering verification work and actively assist in providing relevant risk control proof materials (the specific measures are subject to the platform\'s risk control review requirements at that time) .
Waiting for the seller to release coins
Cancel without confirmation timeout by merchant
Ensure that you have not paid to the other party, otherwise your assets will be lost
Please make sure that your receiving account has received the remittance from the other party before putting money, otherwise it will cause loss of your assets.
If you encounter a transaction problem, you can initiate arbitration, and the customer service specialist will be involved in this transaction until the arbitration is completed.
If you encounter a transaction problem, you can initiate an appeal, and the customer service specialist will be involved in the transaction until the appeal is completed.
Please enter the content of your appeal .........
